updates.details: Maintenance scheduled from 12:00 on Tues 4 June for ~24 hrs.

summary: Faulty network switch, causing some hosts to be unavailable.

updates.details: Hosts host419 - host458 currently unavailable: these make up a large part of the par-multi queue but also used in par-single and other queues. Sci8 also affected. Investigations ongoing.

summary: Quarterly scheduled maintenance day Tues 16 July 2024
